main.public_title: Clinical trial of Priming with Recombinant Human Granulocyte ColonyeStimulating Factor on low dose Decitabine combined with Busulfex and Cyclophosphamide for High-Risk Acute Myeloid Leukemia Patients Undergoing Human Leukocyte Antigene Matched Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation
main.scientific_title: Effect of Priming with Recombinant Human Granulocyte ColonyeStimulating Factor on low dose Decitabine combined with Busulfex and Cyclophosphamide for High-Risk Acute Myeloid Leukemia Patients Undergoing Human Leukocyte Antigene Matched Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation：A Multicenter,Open,Randomized controlled trial
main.i_freetext: Test group:G-CSF 150ug qd -13d to -8d; Decitabine 20mg/m2 qd -12d to -8d, Bu 0.8mg/kg q6h d-7 to d-4, CTX 60mg/kg d-3 to d-2;Control group:Bu 0.8mg/kg q6h d-7 to d-4, CTX 60mg/kg d-3 to d-2;

secondary_outcome.sec_outcome: overall survival;Leukemia free survival;rate of acute graft versus host disease;rate of chronic graft versus host disease;rate of side effects;treatment related mortality;
